 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּלַט‎</span>] **verb** ==escape== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; Phoenician in proper name; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> IV ***escape***, Vulgar Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Old Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎פלט‎</span> Pa\`el ***rescue***, [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פְּלַט‎</span> Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 plural consecutive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּפָֽלְטוּ‎</span> [[Ezek.7.16|Ezek 7:16]] ***and*** (if) escapers of them ***escape***). **Pi\`el** ==causative:== ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְפַלְּטֵם‎</span>; 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּפַלֵּט‎</span> [[Mic.6.14|Mic 6:14]], etc.; ***Imperative*** masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פַּלְּטָה‎</span> [[Ps.17.13|Ps 17:13]], etc.; ***Participle*** suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְפַלְּטִי‎</span> [[Ps.18.3|Ps 18:3]] +; — 

**1.** ***bring into security*** [[Mic.6.14|Mic 6:14]] especially of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>, ***deliver***, with accusative of person, [[Ps.22.5|Ps 22:5]]; [[Ps.22.9|Ps 22:9]]; [[Ps.31.2|Ps 31:2]]; [[Ps.37.40|Ps 37:40]]; [[Ps.71.2|Ps 71:2]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִצִיל‎</span>), [[Ps.82.4|Ps 82:4]]; [[Ps.91.14|Ps 91:14]] + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> ***from*** [[2Sam.22.44|2Sam 22:44]] = [[Ps.18.44|Ps 18:44]]; [[Ps.18.49|Ps 18:49]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מוֺצִיא‎</span> \|\| [[2Sam.22.49|2Sam 22:49]]), [[2Sam.17.13|2Sam 17:13]]; [[2Sam.37.40|2Sam 37:40]]; [[2Sam.43.1|2Sam 43:1]]; [[2Sam.71.4|2Sam 71:4]] participle with suffix,***my deliverer*** [[2Sam.22.2|2Sam 22:2]] = [[Ps.18.3|Ps 18:3]]; [[Ps.40.18|Ps 40:18]]; [[Ps.70.6|Ps 70:6]]; [[Ps.144.2|Ps 144:2]]. 

**2.** ***cause to escape, cast forth***, of cow calving [[Job.21.10|Job 21:10]] (compare [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָלַט‎</span>] **Hiph\`il**, also [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] ***vomit*** out, and so <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">). 

**3.** apparently intransitive ***be delivered***, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> [[Job.23.7|Job 23:7]], but dubious; [[BDB#Bu|Bu]] **Qal** ('perhaps'); [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#Du|Du]] read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִשְׁפָּטִי‎</span> as object (but elsewhere <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> subject of **Pi\`el**). **Hiph\`il** ***bring into security; Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַפְלִיט‎</span> [[Isa.5.29|Isa 5:29]] of Assyria, under figure of lion, carrying off prey (opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִצִּיל‎</span>); 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּפְלִיט‎</span> [[Mic.6.14|Mic 6:14]] (compare 

**Pi\`el1.** ).
